thread.title: Quiz: Can you locate Britain's seaside resorts on a map?
thread.title_full: Quiz: Can you locate Britain's seaside resorts on a map? - Telegraph

author: Oliver Smith
title: Quiz: Can you locate Britain's seaside resorts on a map?
text: Reading this on our app? Tap here to take the quiz . British youngsters are clueless when it comes to popular UK seaside resorts, a survey has suggested, with many believing St Ives is an island in the Caribbean and Skegness is found somewhere in the Scottish Highlands. The poll by Travelodge also claimed that one in five children between the ages of eight and 15 thought Brighton was in Cornwall, while a further fifth said Scarborough was in the Med. But does your knowledge of the Great British seaside stand up to scrutiny? Find our with our quiz. Follow @telegraphtravel
